test.query: select k from (select number % 256 + 256 as k from numbers(10000000)) order by k format Null
select k from (select number % 256 + 65536 as k from numbers(10000000)) order by k format Null
select k from (select number % 256 + 10000000000 as k from numbers(10000000)) order by k format Null
select k from (select number % 65536 + 65536 as k from numbers(10000000)) order by k format Null
select k from (select number % 65536 + 10000000000 as k from numbers(10000000)) order by k format Null
select b, a from (select number % 256 + 256 as a, number % 3 as b from numbers(10000000)) order by b, a format Null
select b, a from (select number % 256 + 65536 as a, number % 3 as b from numbers(10000000)) order by b, a format Null
select b, a from (select number % 256 + 10000000000 as a, number % 3 as b from numbers(10000000)) order by b, a format Null
select b, a from (select number % 65536 + 65536 as a, number % 3 as b from numbers(10000000)) order by b, a format Null
select b, a from (select number % 65536 + 10000000000 as a, number % 3 as b from numbers(10000000)) order by b, a format Null
